text: Joseph Edward Corvo (born June 20, 1977) is an American former professional ice hockey defenseman. He played for the Ottawa Senators, Carolina Hurricanes, Boston Bruins, Washington Capitals and the Los Angeles Kings. He was born in Oak Park, Illinois. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey defensemen Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Carolina Hurricanes players Category:Chicago Wolves players Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Lowell Lock Monsters players Category:Manchester Monarchs (AHL) players Category:Ottawa Senators players Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Springfield Falcons players Category:Washington Capitals players Category:ECHL players
title: Joe Corvo
